short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best tool to organize, search and manage website links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you struggle to manage your browser bookmarks? 

If yes, you have reached the right place. BetterBookmarks is a chrome extension that makes adding and managing them fun and easy.

Features:
- Automatically get page title, URL, description and preview image.
- Add custom summary to selected web page.
- Select and highlight text from any web page.
- Automatically highlight text on subsequent visit to your bookmarked page.
- Use custom tags to categorize links
- Search using keywords
- Never lose your links again. Access on Chrome from any device.

Wondering where's the bookmark for your favourite website that you added 1 month back?

BetterBookmarks are fully searchable and you can search using keywords to locate your favourite web pages in a jiffy

Great for content creators, students, writers! Get it today! 

Note: After a 7 day free trial you will need to get a Gumroad license. Get it here >> nitinp.gumroad.com/l/betterbookmarks

Latest version contains bug fixes.
